Wu Xiu feng is a mother of two who has spent the last 11 years making irons for a factory that just shut down. she and her husband are desperately looking for work and are worried about having enough money to feed their two children. like most factory workers, she is a migrant worker. i can't even afford to go home, "she told abc news. the central government is listening and trying to respond both to rising unemployment and pressure from abroad to take action. a external links
